description: This file defines the main React component for a Tic Tac Toe game with AI and human modes, including UI rendering, game logic, AI move generation (including OpenAI API integration), and chat-based trash talk features.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component managing game state, rendering UI, and handling game logic.

methods.name: ChatList
methods.description: Component rendering the chat messages in the AI trash talk panel.

methods.name: pickTrashTalk
methods.description: Function returning family-friendly trash talk lines based on game events.

methods.name: isStrongBlock
methods.description: Heuristic to determine if AI's move effectively blocks an immediate human win.

methods.name: getAiMoveSafe
methods.description: Function to determine AI move, attempting OpenAI API first, then falling back to heuristic.

methods.name: getMoveFromOpenAI
methods.description: Function to call OpenAI API with a deterministic prompt to get AI move.

methods.name: heuristicMove
methods.description: Fallback heuristic AI move logic based on simple rules.

methods.name: findWinningMove
methods.description: Helper to find a winning move for a given player.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Function to determine the winner of the current Tic Tac Toe board.
